snippet.title: What governance models are best suited for organizations adopting high frequency deployment practice
snippet.description:
Lean Governance: How to Reduce Bureaucracy and Improve Agility Without Sacrificing Compliance

Governance is essential for organizations to function safely, but *too much governance* can slow teams down, making it harder to *respond to market opportunities and challenges*. In this video, I break down *how governance can either enable or stifle agility* and what organizations can do to *implement lean, effective governance* without unnecessary overhead.

7. *21:00 Compliance as Code* â€“ Automating governance to minimize manual processes.

- The importance of *lean governance* and *eliminating organizational waste*.
